column5: Comments
column8: Were you able to complete your task?
column9: Did you submit an order to Scholastic Book Clubs during this visit?
column10: Did you experience any difficulties on the site today?
column11: How likely are you to recommend Scholastic Book Clubs to a friend?

column5: Would like it easier to find things I an order with my reward points.
Could not enter an international billing address    Would like to see more classic children‚Äôs books and fewer, low-quality newer books
I had trouble with logging in, but was helped by an incredible live chat with a operator by Diane.
Any time I would search and go back to the previous page, the search would "cancel" and I'd have to search again.
I never remember to log into "bookclubs" .  Can you make a "connect to Teacher " under regular sign in option??
I want to cancel my order it should not take a freaking month for my kid to get books, I will never order from you again, I will just take her to the book store
I hate the monthly emails with the promo codes for extra points. I believe that they should be automatically put into your account on your next order and not have to be manually entered.
It seems that a family ordered a book that was not available but it still shows they were charged for it.
I would like the books that are $1 to be on a separate list.
I do think you need more classic books.  I often cant find what I am looking for here.
internet problems today.  It is getting harder to trust books today. They have an agenda of putting gay info in for young kids.
Not easy on phone

It would be nice to be able to select a book already in your cart for the free $5 book if your total is over 25.  As it is, you have to delete the book and then select it as a free book.  Just a suggestion!
Placed the order twice but apparently both times it did not go through.
I wish you could search by dollar amount. Like, all $2 books, or $3 and under, $5 and under etc.  I would probably but more books.
it seemed to timeout and forget my teacher so i had to go find her code again.
the site is cumbersome to use and to find my child's teacher.  Also I was never able to find out if the teacher had a wish list or not.

I used to order monthly for many years but lately I am disappointed in the choices of books offered. The diversity books are great and are absolutely necessary but I miss the stories and cd's , holiday books, fairy tales, etc. I have not ordered for several months. Please bring some of those back. Young teachers are coming to me to borrow holiday books because the choices are just not there anymore.
I will look through the catalog before completing my purchase. I have a few items in my shopping cart for now.

I struggle with the paper flyers sent to me. I continue to get 1st grade flyers all year even though my account states 4th grade. Next year I am moving to 3rd grade and I fear that I will continue to get flyers for the wrong grade level.
I had books saved from last night and they were not in my cart anymore so I hard to search again for the same titles.

I receive SO many Scholastics emails that I sometimes miss when I have an online student order. Which happened in this case. The parent emailed me to inquire about the order and because of that they missed their March bonuses. The email informing teachers they have an online order should be sent every 24 hours until the teacher has submit the order.
I had to make a new account because the website kept saying it couldn't find my account.
I would love for you to offer more of the older books like: Boxcar Children, Geronimo Stilton, Ramona, Berenstain Bears, BabySitter's Club, Little Golden Book, etc...
I'm a bit confused with the student flyer order, regular order, and student order??? why are they different? I don't think I'm getting as many points as I used to.
It's hard to shop exactly what you want especially when you are looking for book as a bonus gift.

I feel like your site is very difficult to navigate. I am looking for bundles of books at varying reading levels to purchase for birthday presents. Depending on which search words I put in depended on what pulled up. I would like it to be a little more precise and user friendly.

The site is sometimes hard to navigate. I don‚Äôt like that the bonus points don‚Äôt total as your ordering anymore. You have to go to checkout to see your bonus points and go back and forth constantly.
Several of the digital flyers would not load.
Hard to navigate on the phone
SHIPPING IS TO MUCH, I WOULD LIKE TO HAVE HAD THE BOOK SENT TO OUR HOME, BUT DID NOT WANT TO PAY THE SHIPPING.
Difficult Adding to cart
Keep taking me back to the home page every time I try to turn the page.
I ordered books on March 14th and I checked on March 30th and the status of the order still says processing.
I have sent you all emails regarding rewards and have still yet to receive a response. Do you have any employees working on customer service?  Seems you only have order fulfillment.
Couldn't pull up the view of the paper flyer on any of the months or flyers I wanted to look at.

I tried to enter number of free book under Reads code and it was not accepted. The page rerouted to a drop down where I had to scroll through all the books to get to the book I wanted an it was listed with a different number. Just not as efficient as it could have been
Teacher not on list   Should allow shipping to home as standard option
Couldn't tell what I was missing before submitting...address to ship to
I did not get any notification that a student had placed an order

I wish the website didn't automatically put me in Shop as Parent mode. The vast majority of the time I use the site, it's for my classroom. Today I accidentally put lots of items in my cart, thinking it was for my classroom, but then I realized it was in my son's student account. I had to delete them all and search for them again in my teacher cart.
The site kept freezing up  and I had to restart several times.
Had to submit a parent order and had time to browse.
I was hard to pick the books I wanted for bonus points/money.  I had to keep exiting the bonus order and got frustrated.

When I am in the shopping cart, it shows me the student orders. Then when I am on the last page putting in extra codes, free books, etc., it asks how many students placed orders and I have to go back out of the cart to double-check. It is a little thing, but could the number of student orders show up on the last page as well?
Trying to find parent letter to remind them that orders are due,
There are certain books missing, please provide more box sets for different series.
One of the books my parents ordered is out of stock.  Additionally, one of the books I had in my order for my classroom was out of stock as well.

I wish the YA books gave a slight description underneath them vs having to click into them to see what they're about. As a parent of 2 teens and a little one I could more easily shop for the big kids if the descriptions were on there.
I wasn't able to get a quick glance at the order at submitted
some of the books i could not fine
Wish the prices were a bit lower
I wanted to use two payment methods..in other words, finish using up the funds on one card and pay the balance with our credit card, but was not able to do so.

It is extremely difficult to determine whether a book is the appropriate grade level for a child on this site.  Most parents don't know the reading level codes, and having to look at so many different types is time consuming and annoying.  The grade level ranges are also so large that it's hard to asses whether a book will be too hard or easy for a child.  If you could just provide more images of the pages and table of contents (if applicable), that would help immensely.  I often look for these books online to figure out which is appropriate, but I might as well buy it at that place rather than Scholastic.
The format that confused me earlier in the year have not been changed.  It could still confuse anyone.
After entering the code, I couldn't add the free book to my order when I was using my phone because it wouldn't let me click the book to select it. I had to log into my computer to do so.
Website is glitchy through mobile, hard to checkout because certain buttons hidden etc.
Cannot locate E-wallet easily for book fair

Things got crazy during covid, and some of my past orders weren't filled all-the-way... I guess shipping from printer to store was the issue. I'm hoping that's resolved. Did not order anything today because my kids are in bed, and I wanted to ask their opinions.
Wish I could get all the series for Eerie Elementary not just what was available:)
I would like to get into the $1.00 shopping without purchasing anything.  I order books for students who cannot afford them.

I couldn't submit at first, finally saw I had to choose if school or home to send. Usually when you order something and miss a line, it pops up highlighted. I had to search to see what was missing.  Also i am unsure if teacher has sent in an order, so how do I know if my child will get the book?
I forgot my coupon on my desk, so I will submit my order first thing in the morning.
It's confusing to find things, but great books at great prices!
When I put in the item #, it did not work.

The page introduces the ewallet,  but it is hard to find how much money left on the card, and  don't know how to add more money to the card for the kid to use at school book fair.  The flow of finding thing is hard on the web page
Great site. Would really like to make sure more books were offered for older students.
It‚Äôs difficult to add items to your cart

The website kicks me out too soon after being inactive.  I am a teacher who usually gets started on an order and needs to complete it later on, and sometime I need more time.  I wish it wouldn‚Äôt kick me out so soon.  I just tried to say that I was still using the site, but it kicked me out anyways and had to log back in.
Wonderful experiance! I promised my grandaughter I would order the books but then missed the deadline at school. i was able to find the teacher on line and order with the class order. Yeah!!

I was not able to order Room to Dream as a stand-alone book.  It was only available as part of the Front Desk set.   (The other 3 books were available individually.)  This is irritating, because I have the other 3 books in my classroom library, and don't want to spend over $20 to get the one book I'm missing.

I really just wanted to log in and take care of funding my kids for the upcoming book fair. It is kind of frustrating that there isn't a link to the book fair stuff after you log into your class page.--like have a link somewhere obvious on the page back to the book fairs, etc. It would be more convenient if I could just log into my account and be able to easily access everything to do with Scholastic -- both ordering books and dealing with book fair. Also, both of my kids are listed on that book club page, and I would have preferred to have a way to set up the ewallet for them right there. I managed to do what I wanted, it just took longer than I expected because I had to open another tab with the main Scholastic page and search for our school's  book fair through that....and then had to go through the process twice to make two ewallets....would have liked to just set them up together. Maybe there's a way to do that, but it's not obvious. This site could be easier to navigate.
I‚Äôm hoping the order comes in before Easter break.ü§ûüèª
I think the timeout time is too short.  I had a few short interruptions while entering my order, and it was a hassle to log back in each time. I was very glad the site saved my progress, though.
The reads free $5 book is confusing.  It‚Äôs hard to understand how to use it and to pick the free book.
Did not see apple rewards until after I submitted my order.
It wouldn't let me redeem my March coupon.  I had trouble submitting the order
It would be nice to have all books categorized like in a library to search.
It‚Äôs not mobile phone friendly

It is too difficult to find my kids' e-wallets from the website. Also, one of my kids has a balance on an e-gift card that I can't transfer. Why do I have to create a new e-wallet each time? I'd like to be able to find my kids and fund their accounts without having to start over each time.

Why can't I add the gift card to my cart. It takes me to another screen and ihave to add a bunch of payment stuff. It would be nice if it was all in the same system. I am super happy you added and I will eventually use but only had 30 minutes to get in and out.
Can't find the books in the flyer.  Not seeing an item number.  Bouncing between store, book club, find school page, etc.
The books are too expensive
My sons teacher states she has shared her wishlist with the families but it‚Äôs not showing on her home page
When you are selling sets of books, it would be helpful if you could list all the titles in the set.
Prices are high for my families....inner city /post covid stresses regarding poverty threshold
Couldn‚Äôt put the class code in which is TM2KC
Why is so difficult to enter coupons/free books? I haven't been able to take advantage of my "earnings" because I can't figure out how to do so!
Would love an easier way to track and earn points.  Also, to stay competitive, you should offer used books.
It was not completely easy to figure out how to find a free book
It‚Äôs not very user friendly on a cell phone
I'm finding it difficult to find my e-wallet.  I just wanted to verify the amount and can't find how to get back to it.  I did see an email, just wanted to see it on the site.
This site is unnecessarily cumbersome and buggy. Every time I try to order, it takes so long to navigate. Most of the time, I give up and just order via Amazon.
How to add a teacher to completion so instead used one on file - neither of whom I know.

On a mobile device, this site was hard to navigate. Nothing showed up the right size without manual modifications to the screen and picture, and it was too easy to go back an extra page in my browser.
Hard to browse books, not user friendly

Not sure if y'all recently updated this site, but it was more challenging to navigate and actually find the books this time. Not user friendly and I cut my order short because I didn't want to deal with it anymore.
The site was difficult to use.  I will have to try again tomorrow.
moving from one page to an

Scholastic has been a wonderful tool for getting my students to read, although, I have seen a drop in interest from most middle school and high school students purchasing from the flyers and website this school year. Maybe it's because of inflation on a national level, or as some students have mentioned, it's simply because they just don't see anything they like to read on the flyers. I wish the YA flyers were still available!! And, how can I get Scholastic coupons for my students who tend to buy books regularly? I can recall a few years ago receiving a booklet of coupons from Scholastic for my students that I did not have to pay for separately!
When I try to enter a direct item number from the flyer, it always says it‚Äôs invalid.
Unable to use ewallet funds like we were told we could.

I wonder why I do not automatically receive your flyers AS I ALWAYS HAVE...until this year.  The only time I receive them now is if I do this online submission or talking to customer service to get them.  What changed?  I DO want the flyers each month...always have...always will!    Thanks for making this happen!!!
Missing my second set of interlocking book bins

I LIKED SCHOLASTIC BETTER IN THE OLD DAYS WHEN EACH CHILD GOT 1 OR 2 FLYERS, NOT 5-10.  IT IS TOO OVERWHELMING AND PARENTS DON'T HAVE TIME TO GO THROUGH ALL OF THEM.      I ALSO LIKED THE DAYS WHEN EACH FLYER CONTAINED AT LEAST ONE GOOD HARD BACK BOOK LIKE A CLASSIC.  I.E. SHEL SILVERSTINE OR JAN BRETT

I was told my most recent order (by email from Scholastic) was delivered yesterday to the school where I teach.  The order was never delievered after having checked with the Office.  Another teacher in our District is having the same problem.  I logged on today to try to confirm through my account that indeed the order was delivered, without success.
Have an order planned, just checking with grandparents if they wish to join in on this order
Please offer Apple pay for payment
We LOVE TO READ!!! Would love opportunity to get some freebies or deal on books because of how often  we buy them :-)
I needed to log out and log back in a couple of times to get it working properly.

It didn‚Äôt remember my child‚Äôs teacher and I had a few books in my cart when I realized this so I added the teacher but then that emptied my cart and then I couldn‚Äôt find the same books again‚Ä¶. Thankfully I was able to find a few other books my child was interested in, but still very confusing and a bit frustrating.
I love this website! I just find it a little expensive for a teacher¬¥s salary :( Specially after moving to the US from overseas... nevertheless, amazing books!

Hard to filter a bigger price range. Hard to navigate on mobile phone - sometimes the back button went to the results of a previous search. Also, a bit disappointed by a general lack of diversity topics. Was looking specifically for holiday traditions and tooth fairy traditions or customs from around the world.
Please go back to the old system of bonus points. It's too hard for teachers to earn bonus points now.
Great selection.  Small print makes it hard to see all the books you have to offer.
One of the books I am interested in is out of supply until next week so I will check back then.
i want to buy something and it won't let me

Things were easy to find. I did not like the checkout process giving me 10 dollars for next month and not immediately. Shipping should be free if Scholastic is going to make teachers wait for  the reward!

My points bank is completely wrong. It said I had over 1,000 bonus points and now it says I have negative 14k points. So frustrating that I cannot use my bonus points! What is the point if it won't work correctly. I've never had issues like this scholastic.
This survey was supposed to come after I was done shopping, but it popped up now and I haven't finished looking.

I have made attempts at placing an order in January. First time, there was some error to complete the checkout, which never showed on the site - I just found my order in the cart a month later. I resubmitted it and it finally went through on Feb 6th.    I was then waiting for that order for 6 weeks or more. Nothing. Kid is disappointed again. I check why the order is not shipped. CS says it was pending teacher action. Ugh! Pinged teacher and order arrived weeks later. And order has only 1 of the 3 books I originally submitted. Ugh!!    I review the order today, and it only includes one book, so it seems the charge was correct, but the other books were somehow missing from the order. Why? I have the confirmation email that included 3 books.    I've never had so much issues with an eCommerce site.

I ordered $150 in books at the end of February and have received nothing. Two months is ridiculous to wait for an order and I will not be ordering again. If the site had mentioned that the books would take 8 weeks for delivery, I might have chosen to purchase here or elsewhere. Now, I just won't be back.    The site has multiple sites within sites and the login and passwords don't translate from site to site. Join up the databases or have a single site. This is very frustrating. It is also unnerving to go to a site where I ordered $150 in books to find that they say no account found. Alarming.     I'll be using Amazon in the future. Quick and accurate and easy.     Hopefully, we will get our books eventually.

Scholastic used to carry a wider variety of classics and contemporary books for different ages.  I wanted to get some gift books for a 9th grader and found that you no longer carry some that I have ordered in years past.
The bonus points for being a red apple teacher were kind of hidden. It would be nice if coupons just popped up at checkout.
Its challenging to finish buying a book series. You have them for a short time then subsequent series numbers become not available.
There is alot of different scholastic sites and it is somewhat confusing.  Would be nice if they could all somehow be combined.
One order form wouldn't load but that was ok. I was just browsing that one anyway.
No where to add comments.....  We will be on Spring Break and do not want my order delivered until Tuesday, April 18.

I am very dissapointed with the lack of "Kindergarten" books.  At the end of every school year, I purchase my Pre-K students each a book about moving on to Kindergarten.  There is only one book available this year.  Very disappointing.
Some scholastic books were not available in the book club.
Not optimized for iPhone user experience
It would be nice to be able to see when my 2nd shipment would arrive.  The "EXPECTED DATE" is 5 days ago.
Too busy and difficult to find specific books. Way too much on one page. Streamline PLEASE
I had items entered into my shopping cart, but when I logged in, they were gone.
I was not aware that the scholastic site and scholastic book club were 2 different things, so I was very confused at first.

My class order was $80.  This was to open the Dollar Store.  Unfortunately, there always seems to be a book canceled, etc. which then brings the total down and takes way my access to the Dollar Store.  Very frustrating!

There was no history or order status for me to check despite me placing an order through Luke's teacher last month and receiving and email confirmation with a link to this website to check the status.

I saw a lot of sections on the main page that I wanted to explore.  I would have liked if each section opened into a new tab so I didn't lose or have to back track to the other sections that I wanted to explore.  Other than that, it was a great shopping experience.  Thank you.
I would like it to be easier to search all books by price.
Coupons usage is really hard and very less variety of books is available

I am a volunteer educator at Rochester City School District School 19 and would like to purchase books for 30 Kindergartners.  I do not have a code.  May I request one?   How do I go about obtaining one?   Thank you!
Urgent shipping is pretty expensive, but I hope the books get here in time for me to give them to the kids before Easter break.
It has become too expensive to buy books as gifts for our students.

Navigating to find orders placed. Originally my board stated no orders placed. So, I went back to look again, and again it stated I had no orders to view.  After a few minutes, I then  found a little sentence in the orders area that I clicked on to see if it did anything which it did. Total waste of time,  when I just placed the order a few weeks ago and all I wanted to do was to log on and  quickly check on the status.

My book oder date for students was March 31. I had students order the Dog Man book for 12 . I was able to get to placing the order today April 2. Unfortunately I wasn't aware of the price change on April 1.   I am also wondering why my student's online order and my teacher order shows a tax charge and the other student order does not?
Increase book selection. It's too limited and my favorite student titles are not offered.
It was hard for me to see what I was paying for, and what I had used my points on.  I figured it out, but it was a little confusing.  And the CONSTANT pop ups (from this actual site) are irritating.

The April Golden Apple Code is not here. Also, how do I find my birthday bonus code. Years ago we received a coupon booklet at the beginning of the year, but I havent gotten one in years. I only learned about finding the Golden Apple code from live chat. But my borthday is April 5, nothing yet.

I noticed one of my students had a book in their order that is no longer available. I feel it is not fair to the student or to myself as the teacher to not get some sort of incentive or compensation for that. I lost out on the bonus points and the student lost out on the book. Couldn't Scholastic have suggested another book in place of the one he wanted or at least still have given me the points I would have received had I placed the order and the book was available? Also, I had a pretty big order and got NO cash to use right now. Instead, I got $10 to spend in May - which I doubt any students will order since I just had many students order. I give incentives to my students for ordering and I feel like there is not much of an incentive for the students or for the teacher. Did any of the students get a FREE BOOK with the online code? We should be encouraging kids to read as much as possible. Is the book that's unavailable going to become available again? A bit disappointed as a green ap
I would like to see more of a variety of  items for teachers to buy with their bonus points. I'm a veteran teacher and have seen most of these items for quite some time.

This is one of the most difficult sites to maneuver.  Trying to locate child and school is difficult and trying to see what orders the child had is even harder.  We added funds several times to the wallet and cannot see where they were or how they were used.  Please Please work on you web page.

I wanted to order "Little Frog" at a special price of $5 as advertised in the flyer however, the website would not allow me to do this.  A message appeared stating the book was part of a series for $8.  Thank you.
Flyer on mobile
Can‚Äôt find the April coupons and my birthday coupon, and it‚Äôs April 1    I tried to look up my birthday in the profile but no line is listed
everything I clicked on to set up the e wallet sent me around the site in circles and DID NOT ever provide a way to set e wallet...super frustrating waste of time!

I live in  AZ and submitted my order by 10pm tonight 3/31/23.  I was advised that that I will receive a coupon for 10 to  Spend in May?  Why not April?  Also, I usually receive 10 to spend with my order of over 50 dollars.  I did not receive it...

It is more difficult to add in the orders this year.  I was looking for a few books to give my students at the end of the year.  Normally you have alot of beginning chapter books and I struggled to find them.  I was searching different book titles, authors, and also chapter books. It took me over an hour to place my order.
Please, include board books in your flyers.
It was not easy to figure out how to add money to the e-wallet

Couldn‚Äôt find my March coupon, so I couldn‚Äôt use it. They should be digital and be applied automatically. Being a teacher, you have papers everywhere and it‚Äôs upsetting when you earned a reward and can‚Äôt even use it. Not sure how that‚Äôs still not a digital thing.
The screen obtain my free 5 dollar book was given me issues to apply search and click on the book to proceed
Love that there was a code to redeem a free book, and that there were so many options, but a gallery would have been nice instead of just titles.
Trying to request catalogs for our spanish speaking families, but it wouldn't let me

I was checking on an order i placed on 2/6/2023. I was told it was on backorder. I ordered "You Guac my world" I have yet to receive it. I haven't received any communication as to whether it is still on backorder or if it has been shipped

It would be nice for Scholastic to consider providing bag for the student to take their orders home in. Sometimes when many books are ordered, it is hard to put them all in a back pack, or they get dirty/wet/ torn in the backpack.

I understand why you send a paper coupon, but I don't always remember to use it.  (Which I understand why so that I may not use it) I would prefer that get loaded on my account or give me longer to use it.
It's confusing how to be able to spend the $10 we're given. I can't find where to go to access that.
I didn't submit my order but plan to tonight.

I am not upset with the site, but upset with getting a coupon to use for $10 earned from orders in February that say that they are for the month of March. However the expiration date is 3/30 not the 31st but only in the fine print. Therefore I didn't earn my rewards - sad! I feel tricked.

My daughter's teacher is on maternity leave. The new teacher has her name on the flyer for the Scholastic order. The chat rep, Megan, said she can't guarantee it will get to the new teacher's classroom, which is the same classroom as the old teacher. Megan said I might want to check with a different teacher and send it to her classroom instead...!!!! That's ridiculous. No teacher has time to distribute another teacher's books. So I had it shipped to myself, but the website doesn't confirm that! It says it will be shipped to my daughter's old teacher. If it doesn't get here, you will be hearing from me.

Scholastic's website interrupts my sessions in short time. This is a major inconvenient while trying to find books, view their specs. Please, make it easier and allow sessions to last a one desires. Thank you
Heard about the book club and came to purchase
two $10 offers unable to redeem, painful and long process and finally with a chat agent it was completed
However it can be hard to find books at times. When it separates it out by topic or area you have to hit the arrows to scroll, it would be nice to have a view all button.
I've placed two separate orders on two different days but the only one showing is the one I placed today.  What happened to the other one from 2 days ago?
It should be easier to see what money is left in my wallet after a book fair is done. I should be able to use any leftover money on a next order easily.
What do we do when we have a student order and it is not $25. Do we pay for the shipping or have the parent pay?
I couldn‚Äôt complete this order from my laptop, so I had to retry and complete it on my phone.
I kept trying to print a parent letter.  10 times later it finally printed a full size letter and not a thin strip in the middle of a busy paper.    I would love to get book order forms again.

I would like to see a section that says my total balance. Total, not each order.     I would also like to see more chapter books in Spanish.  I work in a district with bilingual children in a dual language immersion program. In my opinion, you have a limited selection.

I tried to purchase books for my son using my regular debit card through my job but it would not accept it the multiple times I tried to use it. I finally got it to work once I put my credit card info in. I'm not sure why I couldn't use that particular card but it was very frustrating. I'm happy I was able to finally get something to work though, purchasing books through here for my son's school is so convenient and there are a lot of good deals on here also.
I came to the site to see why we haven't received an order.
Maybe just a little easier to see more of the title on the $5 free book section

When I first went in, it was having issues with the credit cards.  Then when I went in later, I was able to get to almost the end, but when I clicked submit, it said there was an error.  I then called, and the person I talked to went through things with me.
I wish there was a guide to the letter levels for me to better order books that my child can actually ready by himself.
when entering the free book, it at first didnt take the code. Had to scroll to find
I would love to see more Spanish chapter books for the 5-6th grade levels.
Just waiting for a few more orders and then I will send.  That is why I didn't submit my order on this visit.
I am looking for a book that is in your flyer as a combo but I only want the one book...Wordy bird.
The website will not let me check out.  I tried three different servers, but it still will not let me check out.
I miss the variety of $5 book offers to use with my classroom coupons like you offered in past years.
Can't find how to load e wallet. I am only seeing a option to purchase gift card which is not what i want

There was a lot of issues with my clicking to close a book's details, and inadvertently also opening whatever item was lying underneath the opened modal.  The behavior was that of almost double-clicking. As a work-around after several occurrences of this behavior, I resorted to using the "esc" button to close the book details modal.  There was also some delayed responses to the site as I navigated through it.  This may have been the result of my working from my parents' rural farm, as opposed to from my home. (Keziah Renee and I are on her spring break and so are traveling.)
I love everything on the site.  I have been a bit confused by the invoices that were sent in February.  Lots of teachers were in a panic.

I tried logging in earlier and couldn‚Äôt get to the part to put in student orders . I tried logging in from one of my emails where a student ordered & was finally able to put in my students orders.   It shouldn‚Äôt be that complicated.
There is balance left on my egift card, I'm not sure whether I can print voucher include the balance.  I'll try it next book fair.
Terrible website. Everything takes multiple clicks to find. Nothing formats correctly to anything other laptop.

I have been ordering from Scholastic Book Clubs for over 40 years.  I started ordering as a child then I started ordering as a teacher and parent.  I have always loved the great book selections and rewards that I have earned and/or ordered for my classroom and children.  Unfortunately, in the past few years I have been saddened by the topics/pictures that are in many of the books.  I am praying over whether I will continue to keep Scholastic as part of my classroom.  There is no guide in the small descriptions on the true content of the books/stories.  I have had to throw away a few books due to the content not matching my beliefs.

After placing two orders in the recently. I was notified that my daughter would receive a poster of Peppa the pig... she was excited to say the least and we weren't given any dimensions for the poster so i was basing it off the money spent $200+ so 24"x 36" for the poster to be. well the package showed up in mail today and the envelope was 12 x 18. I wanted to see my daughter's face when she pulled it out. So, all I did was cut the top open with letter opener Ever so slightly, so she can open it up. And she pulled out a piece of cardboard. Nothing else! The look in my daughter's eyes of defeat and sadness. Your company hurt my  Child not physically but Mentally and I can guarantee you that I will be informing the school About this situation and that we will no longer be participating in scholastics of any sort.  Especially after spending that amount of money for her happiness to be ripped away And believe me, it wasn't by choice. wallet doesn't work in book clubs for the schools.
